content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product(    
	[ProductKey] [int] 1,
	[ProductAlternateKey] [nvarchar](25) 2,
	[ProductSubcategoryKey] [int] 3,
	[WeightUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) 4,
	[SizeUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) 5,
	[EnglishProductName] [nvarchar](50) 6,
	[SpanishProductName] [nvarchar](50) 7,
	[FrenchProductName] [nvarchar](50) 8,
	[StandardCost] [money] 9,
	[FinishedGoodsFlag] [bit] 10,
	[Color] [nvarchar](15) 11,
	[SafetyStockLevel] [smallint] 12,
	[ReorderPoint] [smallint] 13,
	[ListPrice] [money] 14,
	[Size] [nvarchar](50) 15,
	[SizeRange] [nvarchar](50) 16,
	[Weight] [float] 17,
	[DaysToManufacture] [int] 18,
	[ProductLine] [nchar](2) 19,
	[DealerPrice] [money] 20,
	[Class] [nchar](2) 21,
	[Style] [nchar](2) 22,
	[ModelName] [nvarchar](50) 23,
	--[LargePhoto] [varbinary](max) NULL 24,
	[EnglishDescription] [nvarchar](400) 25,
	[FrenchDescription] [nvarchar](400) 26,
	[ChineseDescription] [nvarchar](400) 27,
	[ArabicDescription] [nvarchar](400) 28,
	[HebrewDescription] [nvarchar](400) 29,
	[ThaiDescription] [nvarchar](400) 30,
	[GermanDescription] [nvarchar](400) 31,
	[JapaneseDescription] [nvarchar](400) 32,
	[TurkishDescription] [nvarchar](400) 33,
	[StartDate] [datetime] 34,
	[EndDate] [datetime] 35,
	[Status] [nvarchar](7) 36)
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProduct.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product;
